result.title: Tutorial: how to create a team
result.content:
Hello, guys,

You are expected to solve as a team. Therefore, one of you need to create a team in your profile (press on your nickname, then the tab "Teams"). After this step, the creator should invite other team members to the team.

Finally, in this group you could switch to the "Contests" tab and "Register" for the competition as the team. Don't forget that you may use only one computer when solving.

If you need any further assistance, you could post a question under this thread or you can ask any member of the staff to explain this more.

GL & HF!
